alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:00PM CST until January 12 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE...NORTHEASTERN KNOX...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...GRAINGER...SOUTHEASTERN UNION AND WEST CENTRAL HAMBLEN COUNTIES... At 100 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Market, or 7 miles southwest of Rutledge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Jefferson City, Maynardville, Rutledge, Plainview, New Market, Blaine, Luttrell, Lone Mountain and Thorn Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
